Preview.Title: Structure and Optimization in Engines
Preview.Subtitle: A look at commonly used optimization techniques and structural patterns used in Rendering Engines.

Preview.Title: Void - Rendering Engine
Preview.Subtitle: A Rendering engine built with OpenGL and C++, complete with a self-made physics solution and an FMOD integration, that was created for my exchange to Canada's Fanshawe College.

Preview.Title: Client/Server Chat Program
Preview.Subtitle: A networking project that functions as a Hello World project for C++'s networking library, databases, and client/server programs.

Preview.Title: FMOD Media Player
Preview.Subtitle: A media player that functions as a Hello World project for the FMOD library.
